DevTools

Welcome to the DevTools - created and maintained by Sascha Wildgrube.

Features

DevTools contains a number of script includes with useful javascript functions and classes like a GetType() function that realy works. A few UI improvements like the Re-Test button in the test result form and shortcuts to various - sometimes hidden - views and system properties in your instance.

System Requirements

  • Madrid or later

Installation

To use the full potential of DevTools perform the following steps:

  1. Install the application
  2. Enable create, read, write and delete operations for all applications on the following tables:
    1. sys_properties
    2. sys_properties_category_m2m
    3. sys_user_group
    4. incident
    5. incident_task
    6. change_request
    7. change_task
    8. problem
    9. problem_task
    10. sc_request
  3. Go to the "Install Script" module and execute the script.
  4. Go to the "Install Log" module and check for error messages.
  5. Go to Instance Debug Options and activate the ATF test execution (if not set already).
  6. Run the DevTools Test Suite

Script Editor Macros

Each script include has a corresponding script editor macro (with the same name) that helps to integrate the contained functions or classes into your own code.

The macro "testscript" copies boilerplate code for a server-side script ATF test step.
